scripts.pipeline:create: . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name $STACK_NAME-pipeline --template-body file://infrastructure/codepipeline.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ProjectName,ParameterValue=$PROJECT ParameterKey=GitBranchName,ParameterValue=$GIT_BRANCH ParameterKey=FullRepositoryId,ParameterValue=$REPOSITORY_ID ParameterKey=PrincipalOrgID,ParameterValue=$PRINCIPAL_ORG_ID
scripts.pipeline:update: . scripts/env.sh && aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name $STACK_NAME-pipeline --template-body file://infrastructure/codepipeline.yaml  --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ProjectName,ParameterValue=$PROJECT ParameterKey=GitBranchName,ParameterValue=$GIT_BRANCH ParameterKey=FullRepositoryId,ParameterValue=$REPOSITORY_ID ParameterKey=PrincipalOrgID,ParameterValue=$PRINCIPAL_ORG_ID
scripts.deploy: . scripts/env.sh && printenv | sort && aws s3 sync build s3://$HOSTING_BUCKET
